# footer-component

## Properties

| Property        | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                 | Type                                          | Default     |
| --------------- | ----------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `bottomBg`      | `bottom-bg`       | The background color of the below part of the component.                                                                    | `"black" \| "blue" \| "gray" \| "light-gray"` | `undefined` |
| `bottomBorderT` | `bottom-border-t` | The top border of the the below part of the component.                                                                      | `boolean`                                     | `false`     |
| `bottomColor`   | `bottom-color`    | The color of the below part of the component.                                                                               | `"white"`                                     | `undefined` |
| `flexCol`       | `flex-col`        | If true, the direction of the flexbox which is applied to the right part of the above part of the component will be column. | `boolean`                                     | `false`     |
| `show`          | `show`            | If true, the above part of the component will be shown.                                                                     | `boolean`                                     | `true`      |
| `showAddress`   | `show-address`    | If true, the address will be shown that is in the below part of the component.                                              | `boolean`                                     | `false`     |
| `showIcon`      | `show-icon`       | If true, the icon will be shown that is in the above part of the component.                                                 | `boolean`                                     | `false`     |
| `topBg`         | `top-bg`          | The background color of the above part of the component.                                                                    | `"black" \| "blue" \| "gray" \| "light-gray"` | `undefined` |
| `topBorderY`    | `top-border-y`    | The top and bottom borders of the above part of the component.                                                              | `boolean`                                     | `false`     |
| `topLeftColor`  | `top-left-color`  | The color of the left part of the above part of the component.                                                              | `"blue" \| "white"`                           | `'blue'`    |
| `topRightColor` | `top-right-color` | The color of the right part of the above part of the component.                                                             | `"white"`                                     | `undefined` |
